metadata.title: CVE-2018-9519 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In easelcomm_hw_build_scatterlist, there is a possible out of bounds writedue to a race condition. This could lead to local escalation of privilegewith System privileges required. User interaction is not needed forexploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID:A-69808833.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
